heading: About Bioconductor
text: Bioconductor provides tools analysis comprehension high-throughput genomic data (Huber et al. 2015).Bioconductor uses  statistical programming language (R Core Team 2022), open source open development. two releases year, active user community.Bioconductor also available Docker images.

heading: Contribute
text:
book open-source hosted https://github.com/Bioconductor/BiocWorkingGroups.
Contributions welcome encouraged form forks pull requests.

heading: 1 Working Group and Committee Guidelines
text:
defines guidelines Bioconductor Working Groups 
Committees. Working groups specific short term goals / deliverables 
work toward disband. Committees long-term standing provide
strategic guidance continued support structure.

heading: 2.9 Package Review
text:
Description: package review working group established review 
revise current review process Bioconductor. also tasked 
updating Bioconductor package guidelines package submission
documentation. current focus update, clean , reorganize 
material presented http://contributions.bioconductor.org/. 
group volunteer become Bioconductor package reviewer. group 
refine requirements Bioconductor package.Links: https://github.com/Bioconductor/pkgrevdocs, https://contribution.bioconductor.orgLeads: Lori Shepherd Lori.Shepherd@RoswellPark.orgCurrent Members: Lori, Kayla, Johannes, Yagoub, Martin, Kevin, Estefi, Mike, Daniela

heading: 3.1 Package Build Report Triage
text:
Description: committee responsible reaching ERRORing
package maintainers fix package identify inactive packages 
deprecation. autonotificaiton failure, many ()
maintainers ignore good checking provided build
reports. core team found sending personalized emails greatly
increases likelihood maintainer fix package.Links: https://bioconductor.org/checkResults/Leads: Lori Shepherd Lori.Shepherd@RoswellPark.orgCurrent Members: need members!!

heading: 4.1 BiocAwards
text:
Description: 2020, Bioconductor established annual Bioconductor awards 
recognize outstanding contributions Bioconductor community. 
committee meets annually conduct nominations voting.Links: https://bioconductor.org//awards/Leads: Lori Shepherd Lori.Shepherd@RoswellPark.org Simone BellCurrent Members: Lori Shepherd Simone Bell
